alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 06 at 10:43AM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4301 7812 4310 7822 4310 7848 4307 7880 4298 7902 4288 7889 4272 7903 4278 7875 4287 7856 4291 7831 TIME Y22M01D06T1500Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
